justbases._errors module¶

Errors.

exception justbases._errors.BasesAssertError¶

Bases: justbases._errors.BasesError

For assertion failures.

exception justbases._errors.BasesError¶

Bases: exceptions.Exception

Supertype of all errors for this package.

exception justbases._errors.BasesInvalidOperationError(op, other=None)¶

Bases: justbases._errors.BasesError

Invalid operation.

exception justbases._errors.BasesValueError(value, param, msg=None)¶

Bases: justbases._errors.BasesError

Raised when a parameter has an unacceptable value.

May also be raised when the parameter has an unacceptable type.
